N

na - Variable in class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
normal-vector at edge 1 if gouraud == true
nadirPoint(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.geom.Plate
calculates the nadir point of the given point to this plate
the nadir point is that point on the plate that is shortest from the given point
nadirPoint(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.geom.Straight
calculates the nadir point of the given point to this
the nadir point is that point on the straight that is shortest from the given point
nadirVector3d(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Rectangle
calculates the nadir point of the given point to this plate
the nadir point is that point on the plate that is shortest from the given point
the nadir point has not to be on the plate necessarily - in particular: contains(nadir point) does not need to return true
nb - Variable in class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
normal-vector at edge 2 if gouraud == true
nc - Variable in class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
normal-vector at edge 3 if gouraud == true
Noise - Class in fast3d.util.math
a simple value-noise generator
noise means smooth, organic randomness
the static random field gives the used random-generator
seeds may be set by the random field before every method call
a noise generation is a recursive function: for every step the interval and the maximum will be halved and a new array is generated with those parameter to be add to the given one
the interval defines how many random values will be generated - for the other indices of the array those values are interpolated
Noise() - Constructor for class fast3d.util.math.Noise
 
normalize() - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
scales the vector to the length 1
fails (does nothing than) for the zero-vector
normalize() - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
scales the vector to the length 1
fails (does nothing than) for the zero-vector
normalize() - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d
scales the vector to the length 1
fails (does nothing than) for the zero-vector
normalOrthogonalMode() - Static method in class fast3d.math.CameraMode
 
normalPerspectiveMode() - Static method in class fast3d.math.CameraMode
 
notincam - Variable in class fast3d.math.CameraMode
not in camera
if turned true, only vertices outside of the camera are shaded -otherwise the shading result is null
if turned false: vertices between camera-position and screen are shaded
default / normal is false
notincam is disabled (not considered) for viewmode=ORTHOGONAL
